title: If someone loves or does something of kufr without knowing ruling, will he be sinful Assim al hakeem
transcript: yoshi from india says if someone does or loves something of disbelief of kufur but he doesn't know the ruling will he be sinful if he's in a country where nobody has ever told him that this is haram and he never thought of it to be haram it's an issue of dispute and the most authentic opinion is that when people don't have knowledge allah would not hold them accountable finally
